attributes.action: Scrap the Idea of £10 Licence For Smoking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smokers have had to endure enough. They are taxed beyond belief, and now they want us to pay even more. This is further discrimination and more examples of a "Nanny State".

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at : http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/smokingpermit/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
